semantic_title: Encounters for Treatment of Sequela of Burns and Corrosions Using 7th Character S
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 19. Injury, Poisoning, and Certain Other Consequences of External Causes > d. Burns and Corrosions > 7. Encounters for treatment of sequela of burns

content.full_text: Encounters for the treatment of the late effects of burns or corrosions (i.e., scars or joint contractures) should be coded with a burn or corrosion code with the 7th character "S" for sequela. (Evidence: pg no: 82, L23-L25)
content.summary: Guidelines for coding encounters specifically for treatment of late effects or sequelae of burns and corrosions using the 7th character S (Evidence: pg no: 82, L23-L25)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Use burn or corrosion code with 7th character "S" for encounters treating late effects (Evidence: pg no: 82, L24-L25)
detailed_rules.explanation: When the encounter is specifically for treatment of sequelae such as scars or joint contractures from previous burns or corrosions, the appropriate burn/corrosion code with 7th character S should be assigned (Evidence: pg no: 82, L23-L25)
